item.code: package cn.mxz.task.dailytask.tasks;[newline][newline]import cn.mxz.base.task.NormalTask;[newline]import cn.mxz.task.dailytask.DailyTaskPlayer;[newline]import mongo.gen.MongoGen.DailyTaskDto;[newline]import cn.mxz.handler.PacketDefine;[newline][newline]public class T1 extends NormalTask<DailyTaskDto> {[newline][newline] @Override[newline] protected boolean isAchievement() {[newline] DailyTaskPlayer player = user.getDailyTaskPlayer();[newline] return player.hasDianZan();[newline] }[newline]}[newline]
item.name: 歡迎回來
item.description: 奇遇-簽到有禮完成點讚（點讚得元寶、升VIP）

item.description: 奇遇-上香2次（上香免費領取體力）
item.beizhu: 每天完成中午、晚上兩次上香算完成

item.code: package cn.mxz.task.dailytask.tasks;[newline][newline]import cn.mxz.base.task.TaskAccumulatedAll;[newline]import cn.mxz.task.dailytask.DailyTaskPlayer;[newline]import mongo.gen.MongoGen.DailyTaskDto;[newline][newline]public class T3 extends TaskAccumulatedAll<DailyTaskDto> {[newline][newline] @Override[newline] protected int getFinishTimesNow() {[newline] DailyTaskPlayer player = user.getDailyTaskPlayer();[newline] return player.getProtectedDaJiTimes();[newline] }[newline]}[newline][newline]

item.code: package cn.mxz.task.dailytask.tasks;[newline] import cn.mxz.task.dailytask.VipTask;[newline] import cn.mxz.vipcard.VipCardPlayer;[newline] public class T4 extends VipTask {[newline] @Override[newline] public boolean isVisible() {[newline] // 0:什麼都沒有買 1:白銀月卡 2:黃金月卡 3:至尊月卡[newline] VipCardPlayer player = user.getVipCardPlayer();[newline] int t = player.getVipCardType();[newline] return t == 1 || t == 0;[newline] }[newline] @Override[newline] protected boolean isAchievement() {[newline] VipCardPlayer player = user.getVipCardPlayer();[newline] int t = player.getVipCardType();[newline] return t == 1;[newline] }[newline] }[newline]
item.name: 白銀VIP
item.description: VIP福利，每天免費領！
item.beizhu: 沒有購買的話, 就顯示當前元寶最接近的那個, 如果購買了, 就顯示那個

item.code: package cn.mxz.task.dailytask.tasks;[newline][newline]import cn.mxz.task.dailytask.VipTask;[newline] import cn.mxz.vipcard.VipCardPlayer;[newline][newline] public class T5 extends VipTask { @Override[newline] public boolean isVisible()[newline] { // 0:什麼都沒有買 1:白銀月卡 2:黃金月卡 3:至尊月卡[newline] VipCardPlayer player = user.getVipCardPlayer();[newline] int t = player.getVipCardType();[newline] return t == 2 || t == 1;[newline] }[newline] @Override[newline] protected boolean isAchievement() {[newline] VipCardPlayer player = user.getVipCardPlayer();[newline] int t = player.getVipCardType();[newline] return t == 2;[newline] }[newline] }[newline]
item.name: 黃金VIP
item.description: VIP福利，每天免費領！

item.code: package cn.mxz.task.dailytask.tasks; import cn.mxz.task.dailytask.VipTask;[newline] import cn.mxz.vipcard.VipCardPlayer;[newline] public class T6 extends VipTask {[newline] @Override[newline] public boolean isVisible() {[newline] // 0:什么都没有买 1:白银月卡 2:黄金月卡 3:至尊月卡[newline] VipCardPlayer player = user.getVipCardPlayer();[newline] int t = player.getVipCardType();[newline] return t == 3 || t == 2;[newline] }[newline] @Override[newline] protected boolean isAchievement() {[newline] VipCardPlayer player = user.getVipCardPlayer();[newline] int t = player.getVipCardType();[newline] return t == 3;[newline] }[newline] }[newline]
